name: df-cms
body: |- wceq(ccms, crab(s0, cms, wsbc(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, cv(s0)), cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1))), cfv(ccmet, cv(s1))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ CMetSp = { s0 ∈ MetSp |[(Base ` s0)/ s1]((dist ` s0)|`(s1 × s1))∈(CMet ` s1)}
comment: Define the class of complete metric spaces. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
